title: The Detonators
description: Daddy's deadly little girl.The prim young lady needs a favor: help her father beat a bum drug rap. After all, he is Matt Helm's old colleague at the agency.Suddenly Dad's boat detonates outside Miami Harbor. And Matt Helm discovers that young Amy isn't as innocent as she looks.Â Amy lures Matt to the Bahamas, where an unlikely pack of fanatics may be planning an explosive surprise....
author: Donald Hamilton
